title: U.S. Rolling Back China Tariffs, UK Election Result and Brexit Outlook, 2019 VC Takeaways
itunes:title: U.S. Rolling Back China Tariffs, UK Election Result and Brexit Outlook, 2019 VC Takeaways
description:
Bloomberg News U.S. Economic Policy Team Leader Sarah McGregor and Clayton Allen, Vice President of Special Situations at Height Capital Markets, discuss the U.S. rolling back China tariffs. Bloomberg Markets Senior Editor John Authers talks about UK election results and Brexit outlook. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Corporate Finance Reporter Davide Scigliuzzo share insight on corporate borrowers “adjusting” earnings to look more creditworthy. Jeff Grabow, US Venture Capital Leader at Ernst & Young, walks through 2019 VC takeaways. And we Drive to the Close with Kevin Miller, CEO at The E-Valuator Funds.

Hosts: Jason Kelly and Sonali Basak. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
